intro: Dubyaea oligocephala subsp. oligocephala, commonly known as the narrow-headed dubyaea, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It is a herbaceous perennial with slender, erect stems and small, clustered flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. The plant produces small, capsule-like fruits that contain numerous tiny seeds. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in rocky or gravelly habitats. Its botanical features make it a distinctive and relatively rare species within its native range.
